products.title: Whitfield Cotton
products.description: Min width: 350mm max width: 1330mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 51% cotton / 49% polyester guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
